head.title: For Shrinking Violets And Chary Drinkers

hedline.hl1: For Shrinking Violets And Chary Drinkers

abstract.p: MoMA Design Store is offering collection of new products by German designers; photos (S)

block.p: ''Destination: Berlin,'' a collection of new products by German designers at MoMA Design Stores starting May 10, offers practical solutions to vexing everyday problems. The Four-Hole Aliacta Vase ($110), above, comes with a removable steel shell with small openings. ''If you buy a lot of flowers, some of them are not looking good after two or three days,'' said one of its designers, Jörg Adam of the Adam & Harborth Designbüro, ''and you need a smaller vase.'' The Lined Glasses ($70 for six), below, by Chul Cheong, Christine Nogtev and Jork Andre Dieter, are etched with one to six bands, to help you find your glass at any dinner party with half a dozen guests, tops. MoMA Design Stores, 81 Spring Street and 44 West 53rd Street, or momastore.org.
